title: ICE using const raw pointer cast for array size

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-const-fn
labels.description: Area: const fn foo(..) {..}. Pure functions which can be applied at compile time.

body:
Code:

```rust
#![feature(const_fn)]

fn main() {
    let _ = [0; foo() as usize];
}

const fn foo() -> *const i32 {
    &0 as *const i32
}
```

Error with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full`:
